definition: clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role
to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Article 10 A food label for prepackaged food with fixed content shall declare the net quantity of contents.
sentences.chinese: 第十條定量包裝食品標識應當標註淨含量。
